body: Wouldn't be so easy to approach that guy. As mentioned in the title, that old man is Joukyu Kokumin (first class citizen), a term for people with power and money, and practically immune to the law. There were case where those kind of people killed people such as in traffic accident, just walks away free while the victim can't do anything because law side with the rich. There's also a (non-H) manga, Elite Slayer (上級国民スレイヤー) which theme is giving revenge to these kind of people, but it's more to the splatter genre with gruesome tortures which gets kind of tiring after a while if you're not into that kind of things; got axed iinm.
lmao generic ntr where the girl is a slut

Seriously, you two below me, just blacklist "netorare" tags or anything related to NTR if you find this offensive. No need to feel sad nor sending death threats to author... Alright, that aside, this is sorta generic story plot with some nice art, that is at least better than Ankoman's.
